body_html:
That was great! Final question for the CPU build, is there any reason why MKL is not found? Using the same python environment (default conda), I can

>>>import mkl
>>>mkl.get_max_threads()
4

just fine

body:
That was great! Final question for the CPU build, is there any reason why MKL is not found? Using the same python environment (default conda), I can 
```
>>>import mkl
>>>mkl.get_max_threads()
4
```
just fine
